entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero except plus 4 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero except plus 4 inland. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
